name: Anthropocene fossils
description: Anthropocene fossils Photograph of dead mosquito and 3 frames from the video art De-Extintions (2014) by Pierre Huyghe . Just as mosquitoes are covered by several layers superimposed on the walls of the room, this NFT will be covered by several new layers of data that bury it. Perhaps this work will remain for eternity just like the exoskeleton frozen in time inside the amber. Maybe it's just a fake copy. Anthropocene fossils are a non-linear series of works by the Brazilian artist Car√≥.
